OOC: I don't remember where I last put Rhesus and Stallex so lets have 
them in the city O.K.

Rhesus and Stallex:

With his keen senses Rhesus hears Mustex's hover-cycle and knows he 
must be back and fighting.

Rhesus: Stallex help your father.
Stallex:What about you?
Rhesus: I have... other matters to attend to.

Stallex walks away without asking more. Rhesus then runs around the 
city looking for drones.  He puts a dormant program in 8 of them that 
will activate when they recieve a special radio transmission.
